name: FREE UX/UI Design Roadmap (2025)

rawData.description: Ready to become a UX/UI designer in 2025? This simple Notion template guide is here to help! Perfect for beginners or those looking to launch their career this year, this guide gives you an easy-to-follow checklist and all the free resources you need to learn UX/UI design.What's included: ✦ Step-by-Step Learning: everything is organized in a simple checklist way so you can learn step by step. Tick them off as you go from the basics to advanced design stuff. ✦ Free Learning Resources: You'll get a collection of free resources. From online tutorials to articles and books.Frequently Asked Questions Can I use this with the free Notion account?Yes, you can use the free Notion personal account. You can sign up to Notion here. Can I customize the font, styling and icons in this template?Yes! Notion is the best tool for your use case because it is incredibly flexible. Is this light/dark mode supported?Yes! You can switch between light/dark mode without affecting your Notion workspace. Official guide by Notion here. How do I receive lifetime future updates?As I receive more feedback, there may be improvements and new contents added to this kit. You will be notified of all future updates via Gumroad emails; You can also access the latest template link in your Gumroad Library. How do I contact you?If you encounter any issues, email me at dyniza@uxdyniza.com Don't wait any longer to start your journey as UX/UI Designer. Choose how much you want to pay, you can enter "$0" and click the "I want this" button to get UX/UI Design guide for free (2025)
features: Can I use this with the free Notion account?Yes, you can use the free Notion personal account. You can sign up to Notion here.
Can I customize the font, styling and icons in this template?Yes! Notion is the best tool for your use case because it is incredibly flexible.
Is this light/dark mode supported?Yes! You can switch between light/dark mode without affecting your Notion workspace. Official guide by Notion here.
How do I contact you?If you encounter any issues, email me at dyniza@uxdyniza.com
